entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS4Mac needs a runtime API to symbolize managed IPs #61186
    6.0.x
  • Content-Disposition encoding non-ASCII characters #61183
  • Remove unsupported fields from `GeneratedDllImport` #61181
    7.0.0
  • Matrix4x4 class only works on Windows #61178
  • .NET 6.0.0-rc.2 on Raspberry Pi cannot write to writable network file #61175
  • [API Proposal]: EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider support custom key and value mutation #61169
  • ARM32 JIT: Assertion failed '!"NYI: odd sized struct in fgMorphMultiregStructArg"' during 'Morph - Global' #61168
    7.0.0
  • can't parse french dates in alpine docker image while ok in focal #61166
  • Logging methods created by generators allocate if LogLevel is passed #61162
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Specific PInvoke call works with AOT but fails on Interp #61156
  • Vector3.Dot sometimes return 0 instead of correct value in release mode #61154
  • Application threads deadlock when throwing an exception #61151
  • [wasm][debugger] Automatically show the values of the getter of a property. #61149
    7.0.0
  • ShortTimePattern does not respect the system configuration when in macOS #61148
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to evaluate a static class attribute #61147
    7.0.0
  • (Unmanaged) Structs are not considered blittable by Emscripten / Blazor WASM AOT #61146
  • [mono wasm] Passing arguments to entry point not working #61145
  • Enums are not considered blittable by Emscripten / Blazor WASM AOT #61144
  • AppHost requires macOS 10.15 while .net core 3.1 claims to support macOS 10.13+ #61173
    6.0.x
  • Extremly slow build & size explosion of assembly when compiling for WASM in AOT mode #61139
  • load_assembly_and_get_function_pointer_fn returns undocumented error codes #61136
  • [API Proposal]: InlineArrayAttribute #61135

Closed

  • Cancelling GetHostEntryOrAddressesCoreAsync may cause an unobserved Task Exception event #61180
  • ValueTask.s_canceledTask can be disposed #61167
  • Dev Container: onCreateCommand failed #60807
  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't work with nullable enable at the csproj level #61174
  • [Runtime Store] conflict with dotnet command line #61103
  • JIT: Invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61077
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun + WPF + PublishTrimmed=true does not generate valid executable #60936
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Hashing.Tests.HashAlgorithmTest.ComputeHashAsync_SupportsCancellation #61138
  • FileSystemWatcher does not fire when file changes #60417
    Future
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection in HTTP header code #59549
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to await a SynchronizationContext or a TaskScheduler #61133
  • Half operator < (smaller) not working correctly #61141
  • Question about of using goto in switch case of Linq.Where #61150
  • Boxing elimination doesn't work in generic method specified with a generic struct which is specified with a reference type. #13445
    Future
  • Look at throw helpers in ?? contexts #2233
    Future
  • Double.CompareTo() performance hurt by not being inlined #56493
    7.0.0
  • Allow customizing letter case size when serializing Unicode characters #60762
  • Issue with HttpClient using it on PUT/POST verbs on aspnet core 2.1 #59692
    7.0.0
  • WCF on Linux is unable to create Channel #59681
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Set IL offsets for calls created during devirtualization #61189
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DllImportGenerator] Fix stub generation for char array marshalling #61188
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Fixed ILVerify incorrectly flagging valid default interface implementations #61185
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Convert to OleDb assembly and last Cryptography DllImport to GeneratedDllImport #61184
    area-System.Data.OleDB, 7.0.0
  • Remove BestFitMapping, CallingConvention, and ThrowOnUnmappableChar from GeneratedDllImportAttribute #61182
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • JIT: slightly more aggressive tail duplication #61179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use constant ids for RoArrayType GetMethodsCore #61177
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #61176
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Help wanted] added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Assertion failed 'ins == INS_add' for madd/msub #61171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] MultiplexedConnection mockup #61170
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Applied @marek-safar review to exit the loop once the condition is fulfilled. #61165
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • improved BDD Unicode table representation in NonBacktracking engine #61142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Fold S.S.C.Encoding into new System.Security.Cryptography library #61137
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0

Merged

  • lock protect nullability cache of symbolic regex node #60942
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 2 #61010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: limited version of forward substitution for some relops #61023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Add hidden attribute support #61143
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deduplicate tests with class name 'BringUpTest' #61128
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Deduplicate runtime tests using the class name 'Test' #61125
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Credential fixes #61114
    area-System.Net
  • Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60854
  • Skip sys/sysctl.h on linux in mono #61110
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] simplify startup configuration #61072
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
    area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix dump generation issues for VS4Mac #61063
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #61111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Adding support for X86Base.Pause() and ArmBase.Yield() #61065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #60983
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix value numbering of field assignments #61113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Recognize sbfiz/ubfiz idioms #61045
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, no recent activity, community-contribution
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #61079
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
